title: Grimms Fairy Tale Classics
description:
The series was partially released on VHS in the early 90's and my mother let me get the tapes. These are ripped from the tapes, and slightly compressed. Alas, its not the entire series, but some of the good ones.
They are .mov files. Each ep is about 170 MB

Briar Rose
Brother & Sister
Coat of Many Colors -this is the original version. The Nickelodeon version edited out the dialog referring to the King marrying his own daughter, not step daughter, which is in the original fairy tale.
Jorinda and Joringle
King Grizzlebeard
Mother Hollie
Old Sultan
Spirit in the Bottle
The Frog Prince
The Man of Iron
The Secret Heart
The Six Swans
The water of Life

I wish I had the entire series, but this is a start. Some of series did make it to DVD in the UK. A volume 1 was released with Hansel and Gretel, Little Red Ridding Hood, The Golden Goose, Snow White & Rode Red, and Beauty and he Beast. You can find it on the UK Amazon site.

Ill try to upload as much as  I can as fast as I can, but I share bandwidth, so bare with me.
